description:
Hikaru has been scouted to be a model! But is it true or is it just some creep who wants to take advantage of a pretty girl?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kimi wa Egao! Nagisa no Shutter-Chance
Un bel sorriso! Foto sulla battigia
You`re Smiling! A "Shutter-Chance" at the Beach
君は笑顔!渚のシャッターチャンス
